text: was a Japanese politician. He was in the Diet (national legislature) for 39 years between 1969 and 2013. He was born in Kobe, Japan. During his time in the Diet he was the head of the National Land Agency for six months in 1989 to 1990 and as Minister for Home Affairs for two months in 1994. Ishii died on June 4, 2022 from heart failure in Tokyo, Japan at the age of 87.石井一・元自治相が死去 ８７歳 元民主党副代表、政権交代に貢献 ==References== Category:1934 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Japanese politicians Category:Kobe
title: Hajime Ishii
